title: MCCP 8: Extensions of reward distribution
body:
[MCCP 8](https://mips.mstable.org/MCCP/mccp-8) motions to extend the [MCCP 4](https://mips.mstable.org/MCCP/mccp-4) reward emission window for another 6 weeks. This extension will run from July 19th, until a final distribution on Monday, August 23rd, 2021, and consists of 6 weekly emissions that shall be voted upon in a public vMTA vote.

The suggested options that will be proposed to public vMTA Snapshot are:
- 276,923 MTA (extend the current emission number)
- 242,308 MTA
- 207,692 MTA
- Another amount/reject extension

This is being done as a stopgap measure to allow the mStable core contributors, community, and Governors to reach a consensus on a long term emission plan for MTA that factors in more complex factors such as a longer reward emission epoch, staking v2, and a data-driven approach to how MTA rewards are accruing value to the mStable protocol.

More information regarding the ongoing discussion of MTA rewards can be found [here](https://forum.mstable.org/t/mta-rewards-post-mccp-4/534/14).

**Should we move forward and create this as PDP-27 with the options outlined above?**
